multiplechoiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, navigate to the “HIV District (SNU2)” dashboard. Find the chart “HIV - HIV cascade by gender - 2021” and use the context menu to open it in the Data Visualizer app. Open the Options menu.

label.h3: What is the name of the custom chart title?

div.p: In the Options menu, you can add and view custom chart titles under the Style tab. In this example, the custom title is “HIV cascade by gender”.
